DisplayName: Office of the Auditor General - Main Office
Mandate: Audit public accounts, issue performance reports, and support prosecutions when fraud is identified.
TopPriorities: Audit revenue streams from mining royalties and VAT refunds.
Coordinate with ACC and ZRA when discrepancies exceed thresholds.
Digitize audit trails for government agencies and departments.
ActiveOperations: Fiscal transparency reviews of ministries and parastatals.
Field audits to trace suspicious cash handling during investigations.
Collaboration with international audit institutions on risk-based auditing.

RecentActions.Title: Special audit on VAT rebate claims
RecentActions.Summary: Coordinated with ZRA to trace questionable invoices lacking supporting documents.

RecentActions.Title: Published performance audit report
RecentActions.Summary: Highlighted governance weaknesses in public sector procurement.

TopPriorities: Audit revenue streams from mining royalties and VAT refunds.
Coordinate with ACC and ZRA when discrepancies exceed thresholds.
Digitize audit trails for government agencies and departments.
ActiveOperations: Fiscal transparency reviews of ministries and parastatals.
Field audits to trace suspicious cash handling during investigations.
Collaboration with international audit institutions on risk-based auditing.

RecentActions.Title: Special audit on VAT rebate claims
RecentActions.Summary: Coordinated with ZRA to trace questionable invoices lacking supporting documents.

RecentActions.Title: Published performance audit report
